title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 256.5 - Access to waterless holders
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 256.5 - Access to waterless holders

State Regulations

The doors on stairways and external elevators leading to
top of holder shall be locked at all times. The doors shall not be unlocked
except by authorized employees. A separate set of keys shall be kept in a
definite location available to authorized employees for use in cases of
emergency. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
256.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
